job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Experienced software developer to create a UI on top of existing SDK and API’s for new product development of spectro-radiometric instrumentation.
Proven experience creating a modern, effective UI for instrument control. Ease of use, visual appearance, presentation of data, and complex plotting features are critical.
Good communication skills and ability to document work
Results orientated individual able to work quickly and effectively to complete project on-time
7 years related work experience
developing software to control scientific instrumentation and report empirical information.
Extensive experience in
C#
,
C++
, and
Visual Studio
Additional experience working with Telerik UI for WinForms, Lua and Protobuf
Familiar with
LabView
,
Python
and
MatLab
working environments a plus
Familiar with
Linux
based operating system a plus
Strong testing and debugging skills
Experienced working in a
Scrum Team/Sprints
development process
Working knowledge of
GitHub
for source control and release
BS in Computer Science and/or Electrical Engineering
